qas.question: What is part of the reason for the varying estimates of the bisexual population?

answers.text: due to differing definitions of bisexuality.

qas.question: What is one way a study can view bisexuality?

answers.text: if they are nearly equally attracted to both sexes,

qas.question: What is another way studies can view bisexuality?

answers.text: they are at all attracted to the same sex (for otherwise mostly heterosexual persons) or to the opposite sex (for otherwise mostly homosexual persons)

qas.question: What is the percentage of asexuals?
